name: dumbwhois
description: DumbWhoIs is a web utility for performing WHOIS lookups on domain names from a self-hosted instance. It exposes a simple form and response view, allowing users to query domain registration data without third-party services.
features: Domain lookups: Query WHOIS databases for registration details including registrar, creation date, and expiration.
Simple interface: Enter domain names in a clean web form without ads or tracking from third-party lookup services.
Self-hosted privacy: Run queries from your own server to avoid sharing search history with external providers.
Multiple TLDs: Support lookups across various top-level domains including country codes and generic extensions.
Raw data display: View complete WHOIS responses with all available fields for technical analysis.
No rate limits: Perform unlimited queries without restrictions imposed by public WHOIS websites.
Lightweight deployment: Run as a single container with minimal resource requirements for personal or team use.
API access: Integrate WHOIS lookups into scripts or applications using simple HTTP endpoints.
